dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, why do they keep trying to make the school year longer? Isn't it just... done?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, why do they keep trying to make the school year longer? Isn't it just... done?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, for 2025, uh, it's actually staying put. May 25th is the last day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, for twenty twenty five, uh, it's actually staying put. May twenty fifth is the last day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Education has announced the end date for the 2025 school year. This time, everything remains unchanged, and the last bell will ring on May 25.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: May 25th? But didn't they, like, try to move it to June? What was that all about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: May twenty fifth? But didn't they, like, try to move it to June? What was that all about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, they did in 2023. It, um, it moved to June 1st then. But, uh, it got a lot of criticism, so they canceled it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, they did in twenty twenty three. It, um, it moved to June first then. But, uh, it got a lot of criticism, so they canceled it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The last bell in schools was moved to June 1 in 2023. The initiative from the ministry faced widespread criticism and was later canceled.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so it was canceled. Why are we even talking about it then? Like, is it coming back?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so it was canceled. Why are we even talking about it then? Like, is it coming back?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The ministry, they, uh, they still think the idea is good, you know? They just, they wanna reconsider it later, discuss it more.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The ministry, they, uh, they still think the idea is good, you know? They just, they wanna reconsider it later, discuss it more.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The ministry believes the idea is correct but promised to reconsider it, discuss it with the public, and return to it later.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But why was it so bad? Like, what was the big deal with a few more days?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But why was it so bad? Like, what was the big deal with a few more days?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, well, an expert, Nurmukhammed Dossybaev, he said it wasn't the idea that failed. It was, like, how they did it. The implementation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, well, an expert, Nurmukhammed Dossybaev, he said it wasn't the idea that failed. It was, like, how they did it. The implementation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He said that the failure was not in the idea itself but in its implementation process.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Implementation? What does that even mean?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Implementation? What does that even mean?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Basically, the biggest opponents were, um, the teachers themselves.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Basically, the biggest opponents were, um, the teachers themselves.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to him, the biggest opponents of this idea were the educators themselves, who sabotaged the process.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The teachers? Really? Why would they care? I mean, it's just a few more days.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The teachers? Really? Why would they care? I mean, it's just a few more days.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, like, they were supposed to work an extra two weeks, almost, uh, for free.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, like, they were supposed to work an extra two weeks, almost, uh, for free.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Teachers were supposed to work an additional two weeks, almost for free.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for free? That's, that's kinda messed up, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for free? That's, that's kinda messed up, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're on a contract system. They work their hours, get their pay. So, adding weeks without, uh, extra salary was against their interests.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're on a contract system. They work their hours, get their pay. So, adding weeks without, uh, extra salary was against their interests.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They are used to working on a contract system: they come, work their hours, and receive their salary for those hours. But here, two additional weeks were added... Of course, this was against their interests.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So they kinda, like, sabotaged it? Is that what he meant by implementation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So they kinda, like, sabotaged it? Is that what he meant by implementation?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. They, uh, they weren't on board. It was all about the money, or lack thereof.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. They, uh, they weren't on board. It was all about the money, or lack thereof.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: And the first reason is simple and obvious‚Äùthey don't want to work more while receiving the same salary.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, if they do bring it back, they have to pay them more, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, if they do bring it back, they have to pay them more, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right. Dossybaev said it could be revisited, but, uh, only if there's a budget reserve for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. Dossybaev said it could be revisited, but, uh, only if there's a budget reserve for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, the initiative to extend the school year can be revisited if there is a budget reserve," he explained.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Huh. Okay. So it's not totally off the table, just, like, waiting for money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Huh. Okay. So it's not totally off the table, just, like, waiting for money.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yep. After 2025, they'll, uh, they'll discuss it with experts again, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yep. After twenty twenty five, they'll, uh, they'll discuss it with experts again, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At that time, the ministry also informed us that the issue of extending the school year would be discussed after 2025, and "any decision will be made taking into account the expert community."
